name: DEADPOINT
description:
WELCOME TO DEADPOINT

You are a scavenger. You must survive in this apocalyptic world infested with zombies.
Deadpoint is a third-person open world survival game. Players must explore the open world to gather resources to survive and fight against zombies and wild animals. Work with NPC traders to buy items or complete quests for rewards.

EXPLORE

Explore the open world of DEADPOINT. With vast environment featuring forests, towns, villages, and more. Find vehicles to help you traverse the map.

GEAR UP

Find houses and buildings, chop trees with axe, gear yourself with armour and weapons, and gather as much resources as you can. You can also trade with traders.

KILL OR GET KILLED.

The world is infested with zombies. You can find various weapons from long to close ranged to help you survive against the zombies and wild animals.

DEFEND YOURSELF

Always be careful. You can build protections in your house with wood by baricading them. However, you will need a tool.

SURVIVE

Maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and stamina. These elements are crucial to your survival. You can hunt animals to get food, and find rags as a bandage, or buy them from traders.
